results.content: Very vivid method of presentation, greatly impressed by it.
results.content_html: Very vivid method of presentation, greatly impressed by it.

results.content:
Thanks for sending an invite for your new course, I was waiting for your next courses as you had promised to release in the previous course. I have finished first 4 videos, looks like this course is a connecting course, the A/V recording is brilliant this time. Examples are great as usual. Will get back to you with questions :).
I like the support you provided last time through emails.
